Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Class AbilityPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.app.AbilityContext
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.AbilityPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, ElementsCallback

    public class AbilityPackage
extends AbilityContext
implements ElementsCallback
    A base class used for user to initialize each hap.
    Since:
    3

    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Detail

      • onInitialize

        public void onInitialize​()
        Called when your module is starting, before any abilities in the module are loaded.
        Since:
        3

      • onEnd

        public void onEnd​()
        Called when the application exits. This callback is invoked only when the application is running on an emulator. It will never be invoked on a real device.
        Since:
        3

      • onMemoryLevel

        public void onMemoryLevel​(int level)
        Called when the system has determined to trim the memory, for example, when the ability is running in the background and there is no enough memory for running as many background processes as possible.
        Specified by:
        onMemoryLevel in interface ElementsCallback
        Parameters:
        level - Indicates the memory trim level, which shows the current memory usage status.
        Since:
        3

      • onConfigurationUpdated

        public void onConfigurationUpdated​(Configuration configuration)
        Called when the system configuration of the device changes.

        This callback method is used only if the configurationChange field has been configured in the config.json file for the ability currently running in the foreground. Otherwise, the system restarts the ability instead of calling this callback method.

        Specified by:
        onConfigurationUpdated in interface ElementsCallback
        Parameters:
        configuration - Indicates the new Configuration object.
        Since:
        3

      • registerCallbacks

        public void registerCallbacks​(AbilityLifecycleCallbacks abilityLifecycleCallbacks,
                              ElementsCallback elementsCallback)
        Registers AbilityLifecycleCallbacks and ElementsCallback objects with this AbilityPackage object.

        Callbacks in AbilityLifecycleCallbacks will be triggered when the ability lifecycle in the application changes.

        Callbacks in ElementsCallback will be triggered when the system configuration or memory status of the device changes.

        Parameters:
        abilityLifecycleCallbacks - Indicates the AbilityLifecycleCallbacks object to register. This parameter can be null，indicating that no such callback will be registered.
        elementsCallback - Indicates the ElementsCallback object to register. This parameter can be null，indicating that no such callback will be registered.
        Since:
        3

      • unregisterCallbacks

        public void unregisterCallbacks​(AbilityLifecycleCallbacks abilityLifecycleCallbacks,
                                ElementsCallback elementsCallback)
        Unregisters AbilityLifecycleCallbacks and ElementsCallback objects.
        Parameters:
        abilityLifecycleCallbacks - Indicates the ElementsCallback object to unregister. This parameter can be null，indicating that no such callback will be unregistered.
        elementsCallback - Indicates the ElementsCallback object to unregister. This parameter can be null，indicating that no such callback will be unregistered.
        Since:
        3

      • dispatchAbilitySavedState

        public void dispatchAbilitySavedState​(PacMap outState)
        Called when Ability#onSaveAbilityState(PacMap) was called on an ability.
        Parameters:
        outState - Indicates the PacMap object passed to Ability#onSaveAbilityState(PacMap) for storing user data and states. This parameter cannot be null.
        Since:
        4
